TopicTitle: live streaming now, Tylo landing/Jool 5 challenge

Articles.Content:
Hey KSP fans,

Not sure if there is a sub forum (did post it on the calendar) but I decided randomly to stream my KSP now, I am attempting my second ever landing on Tylo now. I am doing the "Jool 5" challenge unofficially (meaning I don't care about submitting it for a forum reputation it's just my own personal attempt at landing on all moons for the second time). I got almost 700 hours on this game and I been thinking about doing streaming/videos. Anyone is bored you can watch (no commentary, just the game window)... if not I'll save it to Twitch at least for later watching:

http://www.twitch.tv/sedativechunk

Thanks!
This belongs in Live from Mission Control, moving.
